Name Gloss Government executive action
Transcription
Description
Closest FrameNet Frame(s)
Maps to IARPA Source Concept(s)
Other aliases
Comments Modeled on US exec branch
Family Governance frames
Tags
Type Frame
Cultural Scope
Cultural Information Actions made by the executive branch of government - i.e., the President of a country or Governor of a state and associated functions.
Applicability English
